recipesJson.name: Framboise Pie
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
**Framboise Pie**
Framboise is French for raspberry., but this pie is not just any pie, it has a chocolate cookie crust, raspberry yogurt/ cheesecake middle, and a thick meringue on top. 

For the crust, I am using **MB Cookie Bite** with **JF Biscuit**. The cookie bite is a beautiful chocolate cookie and the biscuit adds the perfect texture for the bottom. 
For the cheesecake/yogurt layer, I am using, **OOO Vanilla Custard Cheesecake** with **TFA Greek Yogurt**.  This gives a great creamy cheesecake base with a nice tartness to add **SA Raspberry** and **FLV Boysenberry**. 
The meringue on top is of course **WF SC Flapper Pie**. This concentrate is just essential for a Pie with a meringue.
